articles.author: Annalee Armstrong
articles.title: Big Pharmas finally strike with GSK, Merck acquisitions, signaling accelerating pace of M&A - FiercePharma
articles.description: After circling around the crop of biotechs ripe for a takeover, Big Pharma companies have finally decided to strike. | After circling around the crop of biotechs ripe for a takeover, Big Pharma companies have finally decided to strike. Merck & Co. made the fi…
